meanings.definition: In a manner relating to or characteristic of an autobiography.
meanings.sent1: She spoke autobiographically about her childhood during the interview.
meanings.sent2: The author writes autobiographically, sharing personal stories from her life.
meanings.sent3: Autobiographically, he recounted the hilarious mishaps of his youth.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings tell a story, each stroke autobiographically representing a moment in her life.
meanings.sent5: The documentary was filmed autobiographically, capturing the raw emotions of the subject.

meanings.definition: Describing or narrating one's own life experiences.
meanings.sent1: The autobiographically written book detailed her journey through adversity.
meanings.sent2: An autobiographically inspired film showcased the actor's personal struggles.
meanings.sent3: His autobiographically themed play had the audience laughing at the familiar anecdotes.
meanings.sent4: The artist's autobiographically painted self-portrait revealed layers of emotion.
meanings.sent5: The song lyrics were autobiographically poignant, resonating with listeners on a personal level.
